name: My Talking Robot
description:
My Talking Robot repeats everything you say in a funny voice.

Interact with My Talking Robot with fun activities like
- tickle or tap the robot and see how he responds
- kicking a ball
- playing catch with a frisbee
- dancing along to a song
- have a nap
- Change outfits - dress him up!
- Teleport into different rooms.
- play with his cat (coming soon)
- change voices (coming soon)
...and loads more!

Fun for all ages!

Nothing to buy - no sneaky purchases!

This app does contain contextual adverts
